input.label: Thank you for volunteering to add your text/voice for your native language to the His Hands Reader!
input.hint:
In this form you will add the text/voice for words 1 - 1742.
If you have not already read the ReadMeFirst form please open and read it now then come back here and continue to the next page.

select1.label: What is the main country your language is spoken in?

input.label: Your language code is ""
input.hint: You have chosen to enter the "" language. More people speak this languge in than any in other country. For more information about this language go to this link... http://www.ethnologue.com/language/xxx and replace the xxx with the first three letters of your language name " ". For more information about languages spoken in go to this link... http://www.ethnologue.com/language/xx and replace the xx with the first two letters of your country name " "

input.label: The name of the person who volunteered to translate the text? (*required)
Translator email
input.hint: e.g. Enter your address as "MyEmail at abc.com" so spammers will not easily retrieve it.

input.label: Acknowledge yes/no?
input.hint: Change this to "no" if you do not want your name acknowledged

input.label: The name of the person who volunteered to check the translation? (*required)
Checker email
input.hint: e.g. Enter your address as "MyEmail at abc.com" so spammers will not easily retrieve it.

input.label: Acknowledge yes/no?
input.hint: Change this to "no" if you do not want your name acknowledged

input.label: Person 1: Name of the person who volunteered to record his voice [if none write "none" to continue] (*required)
input.hint: By entering my name (Person 1) here, I give permission to have my image/voice/musical/video recordings used by Robert F. Achgill with the His Hands Reader world literacy project for educational purposes. I understand that my image/voice/musical/video recordings will be used to help illustrate and explain text in the His Hands Reader videos. His Hands Reader videos will be distributed for free world wide with the His Hands Reader video dictionary and reading primers and may also appear in other media forms such as YouTube, or other social video networks and/or Television broadcasts for educational purposes.

input.label: Email of Person 1:
input.hint: e.g. Enter your address as "MyEmail at abc.com" so spammers will not easily retrieve it.

input.label: Acknowledge yes/no?
input.hint: Change this to "no" if you do not want your name acknowledged

input.label: Person 2: Name of the person who volunteered to record his voice [if none write "none" to continue] (*required)
input.hint: By entering my name (Person 2) here, I give permission to have my image/voice/musical/video recordings used by Robert F. Achgill with the His Hands Reader world literacy project for educational purposes. I understand that my image/voice/musical/video recordings will be used to help illustrate and explain text in the His Hands Reader videos. input.hint: Change this to "no" if you do not want your name acknowledged
